channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 01:12 Air anxiety in the Khmelnytsky Oblast Watch Further Messages.
item.description: 🔴 01:12 Air anxiety in the Khmelnytsky Oblast Watch Further Messages.#Khmelnitskaya_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
